title: Bring your family home to this Res Lease in San Marcos. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: ['$2,020 a month includes ALL BILLS PAID: water/ waste water/ trash, gas, electricity, and basic Internet.', 'This 3 bed 2 bath home with detached 2 car garage was built in 2015 and floor plan features granite counter tops, open kitchen and living area, tiled walk-through master shower, walk-in closets, light shelf, ceramic tile, gas stove, and many other features!!', "$100.00 Administrative fee due with 1st months' rent 3 days before move.", 'All 3Z Property Management residents are enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $45.95/month which includes renters insurance, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more!', 'More details upon application.', ' ***', 'Send Text Message FEDERICO to', '--to set up a viewing--', 'Call/Text/Email ANYTIME!', 'Federico Argueta', 'show contact info', '(ask for ID# 4776529)', 'All City Real Estate Company', 'Have other properties available....', '(Houses, Duplexes, Apartments, Condos, All Areas)', 'Please be Aware of SCAMS...', 'Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.', 'Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC']
